Text:
Bad aspect ratio.  File is 16:9, should be 2.35:1.  Otherwise it's a nice rip.

Unless your movie playback software is terrible you can correct this in your player....like the releaser did before he made his screens ha ha.  i.e. `mplayer -vf dsize=2.35 `  Or if your player doesn't offer AR correction you use mkv tools to recreate the file and set the correct AR.

Uncompressed screens: 

http://img834.imageshack.us/i/01siege.png/

http://img835.imageshack.us/i/03siege.png/
